verses.verse: Michtam<WH4387> of David<WH1732>. Preserve<WH8104> me, O God<WH410>: for in thee do I put my trust<WH2620>.
O my soul, thou hast said<WH559> unto the LORD<WH3068>, Thou art my Lord<WH136>: my goodness<WH2896> extendeth not to thee;
But to the saints<WH6918> that<WH1992> are in the earth<WH776>, and to the excellent<WH117>, in whom is all my delight<WH2656>.

Their sorrows<WH6094> shall be multiplied<WH7235> that hasten<WH4116> after another<WH312> god: their drink offerings<WH5262> of blood<WH1818> will I not offer<WH5258>, nor<WH1077> take up<WH5375> their names<WH8034> into my lips<WH8193>.
The LORD<WH3068> is the portion<WH4490> of mine inheritance<WH2506> and of my cup<WH3563>: thou maintainest<WH8551> my lot<WH1486>.
The lines<WH2256> are fallen<WH5307> unto me in pleasant<WH5273> places; yea, I have a goodly<WH8231> heritage<WH5159>.
I will bless<WH1288> the LORD<WH3068>, who hath given me counsel<WH3289>: my reins<WH3629> also instruct<WH3256> me in the night seasons<WH3915>.
I have set<WH7737> the LORD<WH3068> always<WH8548> before me: because he is at my right hand<WH3225>, I shall not be moved<WH4131>.
Therefore my heart<WH3820> is glad<WH8055>, and my glory<WH3519> rejoiceth<WH1523>: my flesh<WH1320> also shall rest<WH7931> in hope<WH983>.
For thou wilt not leave<WH5800> my soul<WH5315> in hell<WH7585>; neither wilt thou suffer<WH5414> thine Holy One<WH2623> to see<WH7200> corruption<WH7845>.
Thou wilt shew<WH3045> me the path<WH734> of life<WH2416>: in thy presence<WH6440> is fulness<WH7648> of joy<WH8057>; at thy right hand<WH3225> there are pleasures<WH5273> for evermore<WH5331>.
